segments.text: Excuse me . Is anyone in that seat next to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't think so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I put my jacket there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It's no problem.Are you American ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . And you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I'm from Taiwan . Can't you see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there are many Chinese Americans , you know.And your English is very good . You sound like an American .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . You are flattering me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , really . I can only hear a little accent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you flying home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes . Actually , I'm going back to visit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You were visiting Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm going back to America to visit . I'm from America , but I don't live there now . I live in Taichung .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ! You live in Taiwan !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Why not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I ask what your job is in Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I teach history in a university . Have you heard of Dong-Hai University ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's a good school . How long have you lived in Taichung ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have lived in Taichung for two years now.So this is the second time I am going back to states . I go back once a year to visit my family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must be strange for you to live in Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn't strange at all.Many people from Taiwan move to America too , you know.Do you think it is strange for them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Well , I don't know.But Taiwan is so crowded . Don't you miss life in America ?
segments.speaker: S2
